price: Kâfirler sizinle savaşmış olsalardı, arkalarını dönüp kaçarlardı da bir veli ve yardımcı bulamazlardı.
arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw qātalakumu alladhīna kafarū lawallawū al-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
